analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS Status: 38 (Defensive). Current momentum pushed the score to 38, yet a surging DXY (Dollar strength: 97.02) and tightening liquidity confirm a risk-off environment. While VIX (Fear/Volatility) eased -4.47%, the burden of high real interest rates (1.86%) limits any sustainable rally. A breakthrough above the 40 threshold is required for a neutral shift. Strategy: Maintain defensive posturing and prioritize capital preservation until macro liquidity and yields show structural stabilization.

reports.EN: GMS Status: 38 (Defensive). Current momentum pushed the score to 38, yet a surging DXY (Dollar strength: 97.02) and tightening liquidity confirm a risk-off environment. While VIX (Fear/Volatility) eased -4.47%, the burden of high real interest rates (1.86%) limits any sustainable rally. A breakthrough above the 40 threshold is required for a neutral shift. Strategy: Maintain defensive posturing and prioritize capital preservation until macro liquidity and yields show structural stabilization.

Se requiere un cruce por encima de 40 para un cambio a neutral. ConclusiÃ³n: Mantener una postura cautelosa y priorizar la preservaciÃ³n de capital ante la presiÃ³n de los rendimientos actuales.

reports.ID: Status GMS: 38 (Defensif). Momentum mendorong skor ke 38, namun penguatan DXY (Indeks Dolar: 97.02) dan likuiditas yang ketat mengonfirmasi rezim Risk-Off. Meskipun VIX (Indeks Ketakutan) turun 4.47%, tingginya suku bunga riil (1.86%) membatasi kenaikan harga aset secara berkelanjutan. Penembusan ke atas angka 40 diperlukan untuk pergeseran ke arah netral. Kesimpulan: Tetap prioritaskan perlindungan modal dan pertahankan posisi defensif hingga stabilitas likuiditas makro terlihat lebih nyata.

reports.FR: Statut GMS : 38 (DÃ©fensif). Le momentum a portÃ© le score Ã  38, mais la force du DXY (Indice Dollar : 97,02) et une liquiditÃ© restreinte maintiennent un rÃ©gime de prudence. Si le VIX (Peur/VolatilitÃ©) a reculÃ© de 4,47 %, la pression des taux rÃ©els Ã©levÃ©s (1,86 %) freine toute reprise durable des actifs risquÃ©s.
